query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Email marketing team manually creates and tests email variations (subject lines, send times, content) one campaign at a time. Testing cycles take 2-3 weeks per campaign, limiting optimization opportunities. Current open rates (18%) and click rates (2.1%) are below industry benchmarks (22% and 3.5% respectively). Missing revenue opportunities due to suboptimal email performance.',
  aiApproach = 'Implement AI-powered A/B testing platform (e.g., Phrasee, Seventh Sense) that automatically generates and tests multiple email variations simultaneously. AI learns from past campaign performance to optimize subject lines, send times, and content elements. Integrates with existing Salesforce Marketing Cloud instance via API.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Manual A/B testing: Create 2 subject line variants → split test on 20% of list → wait 4 hours → manually analyze results → send winning version to remaining 80%. One test per campaign.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'AI-driven testing: AI generates 5-10 subject line variants → automatically tests on segmented audiences → AI selects optimal version and send time per segment → deploys winning combinations. Multiple tests per campaign.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual test creation and analysis, enables multi-variate testing at scale, optimizes send times per subscriber timezone',
  processOwner = 'Email Marketing Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Email Marketing", "Marketing Operations", "Data Analytics"]',
  primaryMetric = 'revenue_increase',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Increase email-driven revenue by 30% through improved open rates (18%→24%) and click rates (2.1%→3.2%)',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 18% open rate, 2.1% click rate, $1.2M annual email revenue',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 24% open rate, 3.2% click rate, $1.56M annual email revenue within 6 months',
  measurementMethod = 'Salesforce Marketing Cloud analytics dashboard, monthly revenue attribution reports'
WHERE title = 'Email Campaign A/B Testing Automation';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Email marketing team manually creates and tests email variations (subject lines, send times, content) one campaign at a time.
